titles.title: A bill for the relief of Robert Liang and Alice Liang.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/24/2005--Introduced. Declares Robert Liang and Alice Liang each to have been lawfully admitted to, and remained in, the United States, and to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
